about_the_game:
Travel to uncharted reaches of the universe with this pack of outer space art assets from Joel Steudler! Planets aplenty, colorful nebulae, starfields, a bewildering black hole and a bold musical theme comprise the stellar selection of assets in this pack. Use them as backgrounds, title screens, battlebacks, or anywhere you please. The high resolution source files give you plenty of options to create your own custom starscapes and space scenes!


Features:

* 12 backgrounds formatted for Visual Novel Maker
* 10 each of high-res 2000x2000 planets and nebulae, 5 starfields, a black hole and a spiral galaxy for you to use in any engine or modify in graphics software!
* all graphics in .png format
* musical theme 'Intrepid Explorers' in .ogg and .m4a format

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
